alert.note: Alert for Lebanon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN LANCASTER... NORTHEASTERN YORK AND SOUTHEASTERN LEBANON COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Annville to near Mount Joy. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Lebanon, Ephrata, Elizabethtown, Columbia, Lititz, Millersville, Mount Joy, Manheim, Annville, East Petersburg, Cornwall, Akron, Myerstown, Leola, Salunga-Landisville, Denver, Maytown, Campbelltown and Reamstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
